Description: Body sherd of Milesian Fikellura pottery amphora; exterior: pale slip; painted decoration consisting of large palmette and part of tendril.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by University College London. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Johnston 1978 / Pottery from Naukratis: An Exhibition on the Occasion of the 11th International Congress of Classical Archaeology (no. 63)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GF.086)
